title: Any thoughts on Veggie Straws? : r/keto - Reddit
body: Ingredients Veggie Straws (Potato Flour, Potato Starch, Corn Starch, Tomato Paste, Spinach Powder, Salt, Potassium Chloride, Sugar, Beetroot Powder [Color], Turmeric, Canola Oil and/or Safflower Oil and/or Sunflower Oil, Sea Salt). they taste like stale mcdonalds french fries. they're made with mostly potato starch. super gross IMO.
readable_content:
- ShootsnLadders (2015-08-01): Any thoughts on Veggie Straws?
I haven't seen anything on this subreddit about a product I found called "Veggie Straws".
Any thoughts on these? 38 straws are around 16g of carbs so they seem like a keto friendly snack if you're having a craving for chips.

- Crucial-Gaming (2015-08-01): [deleted]

- Jelyyo (2015-08-01):
  - heres the ingredients for the sea salt variety. Ingredients Veggie Straws (Potato Flour, Potato Starch, Corn Starch, Tomato Paste, Spinach Powder, Salt, Potassium Chloride, Sugar, Beetroot Powder [Color], Turmeric, Canola Oil and/or Safflower Oil and/or Sunflower Oil, Sea Salt).
  
- Lancerrr (2015-08-01):
  - I'm more inclined to cheese, macadamias, pepperettes or boiled eggs for my Keto snacks.

- Crucial-Gaming (2015-08-01): [deleted]

- Wendyland78 (2015-08-01):
  - I'd rather have cheese crisps. Satisfies my chip craving. I made some tonight and dipped them in salsa. Or cook some pepperoni until crispy.

- Jelyyo (2015-08-01):
  - they taste like stale mcdonalds french fries. they're made with mostly potato starch. super gross IMO.
